channel.title: Problem with shared folders (Folder is empty in VM) (SOLVED)
channel.description:
Hello.
I have tried to use the shared folders option by following https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Shared_Folders
But it does not seem to be working. I did everything the guide said, and the /mnt/shared directory appeared in Whonix Workstation. Then I transfered my files from my host to /mnt/shared/ on my host. Then I entered the folder on my Whonix Workstation, but it is empty. I tried rebooting the Workstation, but it is still empty.
The guide did not say if I should use chown -R yourusername /mnt/shared on my host or my Workstation, so I first tried the Workstation, but the shared folder was still empty, so I also tried running it on my host, and that did not work either.
Any help is greatly appreciated, thank you in advance :)
EDIT: I dont know why the link I inserted has added "Using Whonix with KVM instead of VirtualBox"... I just linked to the KVM shared folders section on the wiki.
